articles.author: Howard Koplowitz | hkoplowitz@al.com
articles.title: Disastrous poll shows Trump’s White House return is a ‘failure’: Americans say he’s ‘gone too far’ - AL.com
articles.description: There were virtually no silver linings for the president in the survey.
articles.content:
President Donald Trumps second term has been a debacle, according to a damning new CNN poll released Friday.
A majority of Americans polled in the survey -- 58% -- characterized Trumps first year of… [+1589 chars]
